habitStreak.title: Habit Streaks
habitStreak.emptyState: Start a streak - complete habits every day!

tooltips.recovery: Body readiness for exercise. >66 = excellent, 33-66 = average, <33 = low recovery
tooltips.sleepEfficiency: Percentage of time asleep vs time in bed. >85% = excellent, 75-85% = normal, <75% = poor
tooltips.sleepDuration: Sleep duration. 7-9 hours recommended for adults
tooltips.hrv: Heart rate variability. Indicator of recovery and stress adaptation. Higher is better
tooltips.restingHR: Resting heart rate. Normal for adults: 40-85 bpm. Athletes: 40-60 bpm
tooltips.steps: Daily step count. Recommended: >10000 steps. Minimum: 8000
tooltips.bodyFat: Body fat percentage. Normal for men: 15-20%, women: 20-28%. Athletes: 10-15% (m), 18-22% (f)
tooltips.activeCalories: Calories burned through physical activity. Recommended: >500 kcal. Minimum: 200 kcal
tooltips.weight: Body weight. Interpretation depends on your goals (weight loss/gain)
tooltips.maxHR: Maximum heart rate for the day. Reflects workout intensity. Normal depends on age (formula: 220 - age)
